pageContext.claim: “You'll have a story, a big success, like in California, they sued to get me off the ballot. I won the suit. It was a huge story. I won the suit. Nobody even covers it.”
pageContext.analysis: California passed a law requiring presidential candidates to disclose their tax returns as a condition of appearing on the ballot. A court barred enforcement of this state law, and the decision was covered extensively. California is appealing the decision, as CNN reported.
